response.overview: Lakis Linatsas is a detective of the plate, who, together with his assistant and his great love, Nausika, take on the protection of the president of a nuclear group, which is experimenting with new weapons. Franco Migametso, an Italian mobster, wants to kidnap the president and comes face to face with Lakis. Then begin comic-tragic episodes full of blunders and unexpected...
response.title: Pidate giati hathikame
